channel.title: Im making a game
channel.description:
ive been making a game for a few weeks now right now im using crappy images i found from google i can code a game but i cant draw for shit ive made a asteroids game like i said ive been working on it for a few weeks am still working on it over 1000 lines of code right now on the game the game does work i have 4 difficulties the game is pretty much asteroids but can someone make me some cool graphic pictures for a ship, asteroids, and a space background (maybe planets and stuff in the background) my game looks plain as hell without good graphics but like i said i cant draw for anything thats y im requesting
im currently working on a boss for my game it will be fun :)

item.title: Im making a game
item.dc:creator: @Sharkboy2222 Sharkboy2222
item.description:
@Sharkboy2222 wrote:

can anyone help with the graphics please the above link didnt help me at all

Read full topic

item.title: Im making a game
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

http://up.ht/UaJ9u2

This book explains the use of it quite well. It also explains bitmap-based graphics as well. First 50-70 pages are for beginners, you can read over certain points you’re not sure on, or not. Just start where you want idc.

Read full topic

item.title: Im making a game

item.description:

im currently working on a boss for my game it will be fun :)[/quote]
Use vector graphics.

item.title: Im making a game
item.dc:creator: @Sharkboy2222 Sharkboy2222
item.description:
@Sharkboy2222 wrote:

[quote=“Dunder Mifflin, post:2, topic:466005”][quote author=Sharkboy2222 link=topic=573388.msg4140078#msg4140078 date=1352054966]
ive been making a game for a few weeks now right now im using crappy images i found from google i can code a game but i cant draw for shit ive made a asteroids game like i said ive been working on it for a few weeks am still working on it over 1000 lines of code right now on the game the game does work i have 4 difficulties the game is pretty much asteroids but can someone make me some cool graphic pictures for a ship, asteroids, and a space background (maybe planets and stuff in the background) my game looks plain as hell without good graphics but like i said i cant draw for anything thats y im requesting

im currently working on a boss for my game it will be fun
[/quote]

colors for each thing?[/quote]
i dont really care what color they r just make sure they come together fine im not looking for anything massive just anything decent will do
but maybe a black background showing stars and planets asteroids obviously grey and ship just make it look good
i forgot i also need bullets for my ship to shoot maybe just like a little beam or something

Read full topic
